attributes.action: Abolish 6 weeks holidays and introduce school buses that pick up your children.
attributes.background: I would like to see if parents especially mums agree with me

rejection.details:
In any case, school transport is the responsibility of your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You may also find the following information on school transport useful:

https://www.gov.uk/free-school-transport

If you want the 6 weeks summer holidays to be reduced, we could accept a petition on that. For example, we currently have these petitions open: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/159737
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/162378
